name: Liella!
description: Liella!  is a school idol group formed by Keke Tang and led by Kanon Shibuya in Love Live! Superstar!!. They are the school idol group of Yuigaoka Girls' High School, and they currently consist of six members. The first generation of the group consisted of five members and debuted with Hajimari wa Kimi no Sora. In Love Live Days! Volume 27, four additional members were revealed as the second generation, who debuted with WE WILL!!. Love Live Days! Volume 39 later revealed two additional members for the third generation, who debuted in Jump Into the New World. In Season 3, Episode 1, Kanon temporarily left Liella! to join TomaKanoTe, a school idol group started by Wien Margarete leaving Chisato Arashi temporarily in charge. The two groups were later merged under Liella! in Season 3, Episode 8. After the first gen members graduated, Margarete is assumed to be the current leader of Liella!, after Tomari's request for her to stay in Japan, in Season 3, Episode 11.
